lead_paragraph: One of the largest rescues of pets in the history of the A.S.P.C.A. is being carried out in North Carolina, where 600 or more animals have been seized from a no-kill shelter.

headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Animals Seized From No-Kill Shelter
headline.main: North Carolina: Animals Seized From No-Kill Shelter

snippet: One of the largest rescues of pets in the history of the A.S.P.C.A. is being carried out in North Carolina, where 600 or more animals have been seized from a no-kill shelter.
abstract: Over 600 dogs, cats, horses and other animals have been seized from Haven-Friends for Life no-kill shelter in Raeford, North Carolina, after its managers were arrested on animal cruelty charges; is one of largest pet rescues in history of American Society for Prevention of Cruelty to Animals.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
